name: INSetRadioStationIntent
desc: A request to change the current radio station.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(radioType: INRadioType, frequency: Double?, stationName: String?, channel: String?, presetNumber: Int?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified climate settings information.

items.name: var radioType: INRadioType
items.desc: The type of radio tuner to use.

items.name: var frequency: Double?
items.desc: The broadcast frequency of the radio station.

items.name: var stationName: String?
items.desc: The name associated with the radio station.

items.name: var channel: String?
items.desc: The channel number of the station.

items.name: var presetNumber: Int?
items.desc: The programmable preset assigned to the station.
